name: Chess Questers
description:
Chess Questers

Take a random party of heroes on an rpg adventure full of procedurally generated encounters involving turn-based combat on a 2D grid.

Your adventurers move like chess pieces and fight like brave warriors!

Mouse Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Pick actions and confirm targets.

Scroll wheel - Zoom in and out.

Camera Controls:

WASD - Move the camera up, left, down, right.

Q - Rotate left

E - Rotate right

R - Focus on active character.

(Best played in Full Screen)

[An early prototype with lots more to come!]
